DOC.brief_summary: The goal clinical research study compare high-flow oxygen , low-flow oxygen , high-flow air , low-flow air help decrease shortness breath cancer patient . Researchers also want learn therapy help improve lung function quality life .
DOC.brief_title: High-Flow Oxygen Dyspnea Hospitalized Cancer Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Study Groups Procedures : If agree take part study , receive 4 different breathe therapy : - High-flow oxygen - Low-flow oxygen - High-flow air - Low-flow air The order give randomly assign ( roll dice ) . You equal chance assign group . Neither study staff know therapy order assign . However , need safety , study staff able find receiving . All 4 breathing therapy take 80 minute total complete ( 10 minute treatment 10 minute break treatment ) . You receive air oxygen small tube place nose . The respiratory therapist adjust therapy comfort level . At end breathing therapy , ask shortness breath improvement . You also ask could tell whether received oxygen air therapy . After finish 4 breathing therapy , complete 2 questionnaire breathe therapy like thought take part study . These take 10 minute total complete . Length Study : You take study longer wish take part , need drug help shortness breath study . Your participation study complete questionnaire . This investigational study . Comparing high-flow air , low-flow air , high-flow oxygen , low-flow oxygen treat shortness breath consider investigational . Up 36 participant enrol study . All take part MD Anderson .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Diagnosis cancer 2 . Inpatient see palliative care , thoracic oncology , emergency care MD Anderson Cancer Center 3 . Borg Intensity rating rest > /=3 10 ( average last 24 hour ) 4 . Nonhypoxemic ( i.e . oxygen saturation > 90 % ambient air ) 5 . Able communicate English Spanish 6 . Age > /= 18 year 7 . Able tolerate highflow oxygen/air 1 . Memorial Delirium Rating Scale > 13 2 . Hemodynamic instability 3 . Respiratory failure require mechanical ventilation noninvasive ventilation 4 . Frequent use rescue opioids > 8x/day rescue bronchodilator > 8x/day last 24 hour 5 . Currently require high flow oxygen oxygenation
